LanguageData.RestoreToDefaultLabel: Replace saved mod settings and restore to default
LanguageData.enableInsectoidJumpsDesc: Insectoids can jump on the victim.
LanguageData.enableVEFIntegrationDesc: Disables ranged verb patch for domestic animals.
LanguageData.deathRattleChanceDesc: The chance that Death Rattle will trigger. If it doesnt trigger, the pawn will die instantly (default 100%).
LanguageData.disableBarghestEclipseDesc: Barghest's will not longer cause an eclipse when on the map.
LanguageData.EnableRoofDamageDesc: If Expanded Roofing roofs take damage from meteorites or skyfallers.
LanguageData.PassionUpdateDesc: a specialised system for assigning passions to make it make sense and avoid inconsistencies.
LanguageData.RaidWeightDelayDesc: Higher value increase the delay between raids. Suitable values:100-300.
LanguageData.RaidDaysDelayDesc: Shifting RaidWeightDelay value in days, that affect the chance of a raid. Default:2 Suitable values:-4-4
LanguageData.RaidDaysVariationMinDesc: Shifting minimal variation in days, that affect the chance of a raid. Default:-2 Suitable values:-4-0
LanguageData.RaidDaysVariationMaxDesc: Shifting maximum variation in days, that affect the chance of a raid. Should be higher then min value. Default:4 Suitable values:0-4
LanguageData.RaidPointsMultiplierDesc: A raid strength multiplier that affects the number of enemies in the raid. Default:1.9 (No multiplier). Suitable values:0.50-2.00
LanguageData.RaidDoubleChanceDesc: Chance to spawn a double raid. Default:0.2 Suitable values: 0-0.25
LanguageData.DefaultRaidLandingChanceDesc: Chance to drop raid with landing. Default:0.05 Suitable values:0.01-0.05
LanguageData.MaxRaidLandingChanceDesc: Max chance to drop raid with landing. Default:0.20 Should be higher then default value. Suitable values: 0.01-0.05
LanguageData.ChanceToInstantDestroyAmmoDesc: Chance to completely destroy the enemy ammo on a kill.
LanguageData.ChanceToInstantDestroyEnemyItemLabel: Chance To Instant Destroy Enemy Item: {0}
LanguageData.ChanceToInstantDestroyEnemyItemDesc: Chance to completely destroy enemy equipment on a kill.
LanguageData.ChanceToDamageEnemyItemDesc: Chance to damage an enemy equipment on a kill.
LanguageData.MinAmountDeteriorationDesc: Min chance to damage enemy equipment on a kill.
LanguageData.MaxAmountDeteriorationDesc: Max chance to damage enemy equipment on a kill.
LanguageData.MaxRaidCountDesc: Max possible pawns in raid. Default:130 MinValue:10 MaxValue:500
LanguageData.MaxCountToReduceDesc: Would count already spawned enemy pawns on map and subtract from MaxRaidCount. Default: 50 MinValue:1 MaxValue:(MaxRaidCount - 1)
LanguageData.EnableAfterDaysPassedDesc: Enable assistant after passed gamed days. Default:120.
LanguageData.AverageAssistDelayDesc: The amount of time between triggering assistant events. Suitable values:1800-3000
LanguageData.AssistantRaidPointsMultiplierDesc: Assistant raid points multiplier. Suitable values:0.5-1.0
LanguageData.EnableBombardamentDesc: Enabled Bombardament to assist enemy factions?
LanguageData.EnablePowerBeamStrikeDesc: Enabled Beam strike to assist enemy factions?
LanguageData.EnableFireGlowDesc: Enables additional fire glow for ambiance. Could reduce game performance. Disabled by default.
LanguageData.UseCustomSkillDecayLabel: Use SK Custom Skill Decay System(Needs restart after switching)
LanguageData.UseCustomSkillDecayDesc: Adjusts the skill decay per level, adds check points at certain levels for different skills, also stops skill from decaying if it is improved within the day.
